name: SKEmitterNode
desc: A source of various particle effects.

items.name: var targetNode: SKNode?
items.desc: The target node that renders the emitter’s particles.

items.name: func advanceSimulationTime(TimeInterval)
items.desc: Advances the emitter particle simulation.

items.name: func resetSimulation()
items.desc: Removes all existing particles and restarts the simulation.

items.name: var particleBirthRate: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which new particles are created.

items.name: var numParticlesToEmit: Int
items.desc: The number of particles the emitter should emit before stopping.

items.name: var particleRenderOrder: SKParticleRenderOrder
items.desc: The order in which the emitter’s particles are rendered.

items.name: enum SKParticleRenderOrder
items.desc: The order to use when the emitter’s particles are rendered.

items.name: var particleLifetime: CGFloat
items.desc: The average lifetime of a particle, in seconds.

items.name: var particleLifetimeRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s lifetime.

items.name: var particlePosition: CGPoint
items.desc: The average starting position for a particle.

items.name: var particlePositionRange: CGVector
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s position.

items.name: var particleZPosition: CGFloat
items.desc: The average starting depth of a particle.

items.name: var particleSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The average initial speed of a new particle, in points per second.

items.name: var particleSpeedRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s initial speed.

items.name: var emissionAngle: CGFloat
items.desc: The average initial direction of a particle, expressed as an angle in radians.

items.name: var emissionAngleRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s initial direction, expressed as an angle in radians.

items.name: var xAcceleration: CGFloat
items.desc: The acceleration to apply to a particle’s horizontal velocity.

items.name: var yAcceleration: CGFloat
items.desc: The acceleration to apply to a particle’s vertical velocity.

items.name: var particleRotation: CGFloat
items.desc: The average initial rotation of a particle, expressed as an angle in radians.

items.name: var particleRotationRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s initial rotation, expressed as an angle in radians.

items.name: var particleRotationSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The speed at which a particle rotates, expressed in radians per second.

items.name: var particleScale: CGFloat
items.desc: The average initial scale factor of a particle.

items.name: var particleScaleRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s initial scale.

items.name: var particleScaleSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which a particle’s scale factor changes per second.

items.name: var particleScaleSequence: SKKeyframeSequence?
items.desc: The sequence used to specify the scale factor of a particle over its lifetime.

items.name: var particleTexture: SKTexture?
items.desc: The texture to use to render a particle.

items.name: var particleSize: CGSize
items.desc: The starting size of each particle.

items.name: var particleColorSequence: SKKeyframeSequence?
items.desc: The sequence used to specify the color components of a particle over its lifetime.

items.name: var particleColor: UIColor
items.desc: The average initial color for a particle.

items.name: var particleColorAlphaRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for the alpha component of a particle’s initial color.

items.name: var particleColorBlueRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for the blue component of a particle’s initial color.

items.name: var particleColorGreenRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for the green component of a particle’s initial color.

items.name: var particleColorRedRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for the red component of a particle’s initial color.

items.name: var particleColorAlphaSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the alpha component of a particle’s color changes per second.

items.name: var particleColorBlueSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the blue component of a particle’s color changes per second.

items.name: var particleColorGreenSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the green component of a particle’s color changes per second.

items.name: var particleColorRedSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the red component of a particle’s color changes per second.

items.name: var particleColorBlendFactorSequence: SKKeyframeSequence?
items.desc: The sequence used to specify the color blend factor of a particle over its lifetime.

items.name: var particleColorBlendFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: The average starting value for the color blend factor.

items.name: var particleColorBlendFactorRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s starting color blend factor.

items.name: var particleColorBlendFactorSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the color blend factor changes per second.

items.name: var particleBlendMode: SKBlendMode
items.desc: The blending mode used to blend particles into the framebuffer.

items.name: var particleAlphaSequence: SKKeyframeSequence?
items.desc: The sequence used to specify the alpha value of a particle over its lifetime.

items.name: var particleAlpha: CGFloat
items.desc: The average starting alpha value for a particle.

items.name: var particleAlphaRange: CGFloat
items.desc: The range of allowed random values for a particle’s starting alpha value.

items.name: var particleAlphaSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the alpha value of a particle changes per second.

items.name: var particleAction: SKAction?
items.desc: An action executed by new particles.

items.name: var fieldBitMask: UInt32
items.desc: A mask that defines which categories of physics fields can exert forces on the particles.

items.name: var shader: SKShader?
items.desc: A custom shader used to determine how particles are rendered.

items.name: var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue]
items.desc: The values of each attribute associated with the node's attached shader.

items.name: func setValue(SKAttributeValue, forAttribute: String)
items.desc: Sets an attribute value for an attached shader.

items.name: func value(forAttributeNamed: String) -> SKAttributeValue?
items.desc: Gets the value of a shader attribute.
